verses.verse: These also are <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%>, which the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> copied <S%H6275>out<s%>.
It is the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H5641>conceal<s%> a <S%H1697>thing<s%>; But the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> is to search <S%H2713>out<s%> a <S%H1697>matter<s%>.
As the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> for <S%H7312>height<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> for <S%H6011>depth<s%>, So the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H4428>kings<s%> is <S%H2714>unsearchable<s%>.
Take <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H5509>dross<s%> from the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, And there cometh <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H3627>vessel<s%> for the <S%H6884>refiner<s%>:
Take <S%H1898>away<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, And his <S%H3678>throne<s%> shall be <S%H3559>established<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>.
Put not thyself <S%H1921>forward<s%> in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%>, And <S%H5975>stand<s%> not in the <S%H4725>place<s%> of great <S%H1419>men<s%>:

For <S%H2896>better<s%> is it that it be <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5927>thee<s%>, Come up <S%H8213>hither<s%>, Than that thou shouldest be put lower in the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H5081>prince<s%>, Whom thine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%>.

Go not <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4118>hastily<s%> to <S%H7378>strive<s%>, Lest thou know not what to <S%H6213>do<s%> in the <S%H319>end<s%> <S%H7453>thereof<s%>, When thy neighbor hath put thee to <S%H3637>shame<s%>.
Debate <S%H7378><s%> thy <S%H7379>cause<s%> with thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> <S%H1540>himself<s%>, And disclose not the <S%H5475>secret<s%> of <S%H312>another<s%>;
Lest he that <S%H8085>heareth<s%> it <S%H2616>revile<s%> <S%H1681>thee<s%>, And thine infamy turn not <S%H7725>away<s%>.
A <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H212>fitly<s%> <S%H1696>spoken<s%> Is like <S%H8598>apples<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> in <S%H4906>network<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>.

As an <S%H5141>ear-ring<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and an <S%H2481>ornament<s%> of fine <S%H3800>gold<s%>, So is a <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H3198>reprover<s%> upon an <S%H8085>obedient<s%> <S%H241>ear<s%>.

As the <S%H6793>cold<s%> of <S%H7950>snow<s%> in the <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, So is a <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6735>messenger<s%> to them that <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H7725>him<s%>; For he refresheth the <S%H5315>soul<s%> of his <S%H113>masters<s%>.
As <S%H5387>clouds<s%> and <S%H7307>wind<s%> without <S%H1653>rain<s%>, So is <S%H376>he<s%> that <S%H1984>boasteth<s%> himself of his <S%H4991>gifts<s%> <S%H8267>falsely<s%>.
By <S%H753>long<s%> <S%H639>forbearing<s%> is a <S%H7101>ruler<s%> <S%H6601>persuaded<s%>, And a <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H7665>breaketh<s%> the <S%H1634>bone<s%>.
Hast thou <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%>? <S%H398>eat<s%> so much as is <S%H1767>sufficient<s%> for <S%H7646>thee<s%>, Lest thou be filled <S%H6958>therewith<s%>, and vomit it.
Let thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> be <S%H3365>seldom<s%> in thy <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, Lest he be <S%H7646>weary<s%> of <S%H8130>thee<s%>, and hate thee.

A <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H6030>beareth<s%> <S%H8267>false<s%> <S%H5707>witness<s%> against his <S%H7453>neighbor<s%> Is a <S%H4650>maul<s%>, and a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and a <S%H8150>sharp<s%> <S%H2671>arrow<s%>.

Confidence <S%H4009><s%> in an unfaithful <S%H898>man<s%> in <S%H3117>time<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble<s%> Is like a <S%H7465>broken<s%> <S%H8127>tooth<s%>, and a <S%H7272>foot<s%> out of <S%H4154>joint<s%>.

As one that taketh <S%H5710>off<s%> a <S%H899>garment<s%> in <S%H7135>cold<s%> <S%H3117>weather<s%>, and as <S%H2558>vinegar<s%> upon <S%H5427>soda<s%>, So is he that <S%H7891>singeth<s%> <S%H7892>songs<s%> to a <S%H7451>heavy<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%>.
If thine <S%H8130>enemy<s%> be <S%H7457>hungry<s%>, give him <S%H3899>bread<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>; And if he be <S%H6771>thirsty<s%>, give him <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8248>drink<s%>:
For thou wilt <S%H2846>heap<s%> coals of <S%H1513>fire<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head<s%>, And <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will reward <S%H7999>thee<s%>.
The <S%H6828>north<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> bringeth <S%H2342>forth<s%> <S%H1653>rain<s%>: So doth a <S%H5643>backbiting<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> an <S%H2194>angry<s%> <S%H6440>countenance<s%>.

It is <S%H2896>better<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H6438>corner<s%> of the <S%H1406>housetop<s%>, Than with a <S%H4079>contentious<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> in a <S%H2267>wide<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>.
As <S%H7119>cold<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> to a <S%H5889>thirsty<s%> <S%H5315>soul<s%>, So is <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>news<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>.

As a <S%H7515>troubled<s%> <S%H4599>fountain<s%>, and a <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> <S%H4599>spring<s%>, So is a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man that <S%H4131>giveth<s%> way <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.
It is not <S%H2896>good<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H1706>honey<s%>: So for men to <S%H2714>search<s%> out their own <S%H3519>glory<s%> is <S%H3519>grievous<s%>.
He <S%H376><s%> whose <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is without <S%H4623>restraint<s%> Is like a <S%H5892>city<s%> that is broken <S%H6555>down<s%> and without <S%H2346>walls<s%>.
